sent.orig: Support input box translate and selected text translate.
sent.trans: 支持输入框翻译和选定的文本翻译。

sent.orig: He asked us to translate these sentences into English.
sent.trans: 他要求我们把这些句子翻译成英语。

sent.orig: Translate English songs on the requirements to achieve high quality standards and embody the artistry.
sent.trans: 就要求英语歌曲翻译达到高质量的水准以至体现艺术性。

sent.orig: Assist to prepare proposals, quotations, and other related sales documents. Translate documents Admin.
sent.trans: 协助准备报价、方案、标书，及其它相关的销售文档翻译文件。

sent.orig: I can translate the first sentence into Chinese.
sent.trans: 我能把第一句译成中文。
